Package com.example.ex5.controllers

Class CommentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex5.controllers.CommentController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/comments") @Validated public class CommentController extends Object
Controller for handling comment-related requests.

    • addComment

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addComment(@RequestParam Long newsId, @RequestParam String content, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails currentUser, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Adds a comment to a news article.
      Parameters:
      newsId - the ID of the news article
      content - the content of the comment
      currentUser - the currently authenticated user
      model - the model to be used
      session - the HTTP session
      Returns:
      redirect to the news page

    • deleteComment

      @PostMapping("/deletecomment") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')") public String deleteComment(@RequestParam("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Deletes a comment.
